snippet: The Plain Dealer, owned by Advance Publications, will trim home delivery to three days a week and lay off 53 newsroom employees.
abstract: Advanced Publications announces that Cleveland Plain Dealer will trim home delivery and lay off 53 newsroom employees.
lead_paragraph: The Plain Dealer, owned by Advance Publications, will trim home delivery to three days a week and lay off 53 newsroom employees.

headline.seo: Cleveland Paper to Curtail Delivery and Cut Staff
headline.main: Cleveland Paper to Trim Delivery and Cut Staff
headline.print_headline: Cleveland Paper to Trim Delivery and Cut Staff
